duties_responsibilities.duty: Carefully prepare estimates by gathering proposals, blueprints, specifications, and related documents.
Identify labor, material, and time requirements by studying proposals, blueprints, and specifications.
Compute costs by analyzing labor, material, and time requirements.
Provide quotes to customers and outside vendors.
Solicit pricing and compile information from supplies to formulate detailed quotes.

education_certification.credential: Degree or high school diploma/GED, or the equivalent.
